    Example using Berry, Levinson, Pakes (1995)

Automobile market data from Berry, Levinsohn, Pakes (1995)

Source: R/BLP_1995.R
BLP_1995.Rd

Automobile market data from Berry, Levinsohn, Pakes (1995) as retrived from the reproduction excercise in Chernozhukov, Hansen, and Spindler (2015).

Usage

BLP_1995

Format

A data frame with 2217 rows and 13 variables.

air

Indicator equal to 1 if the vehicle has air conditioning

cdid

Index of competing firms

firmid

Firm index

hpwt

Horsepower divided by weight

id

Vehicle index

model.name

Name of the vehicle model

mpd

Miles per dollar

mpg

Miles per gallon

outshr

Share of the outside option

price

Vehicle price

share

Market share

space

Vehicle size

trend

Time trend

Source

/https://www.aeaweb.org/articles?id=10.1257/aer.p20151022/
